statements: SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, repair_needed FROM machinery_maintenance;
SELECT * FROM machinery_maintenance;
SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_date FROM machinery_maintenance WHERE repair_needed = TRUE;
SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_type FROM machinery_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM machinery_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine';
SELECT * FROM machinery_maintenance WHERE machinery_id = 1;
SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_date FROM machinery_maintenance WHERE repair_needed = true;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS num_maintenance FROM machinery_maintenance GROUP BY maintenance_type;
SELECT * FROM machinery_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_type FROM machinery_maintenance ORDER BY machinery_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM machinery_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM machinery_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM machinery_repair_schedule WHERE repair_type = 'Emergency' ORDER BY repair_date;
SELECT machinery_id, repair_type, repair_cost FROM machinery_repair_schedule WHERE repair_cost < 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records FROM machinery_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_cost FROM machinery_maintenance_schedule WHERE machinery_id = 1;
SELECT repair_id, machinery_id, repair_type, repair_date, repair_cost FROM machinery_repair_schedule WHERE repair_date >= '2022-01-01' AND repair_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM machinery_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT machinery_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM machinery_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 AND maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;

SELECT machinery_id, repair_id, repair_type FROM machinery_maintenance_schedule JOIN machinery_repair_schedule ON machinery_maintenance_schedule.machinery_id = machinery_repair_schedule.machinery_id WHERE repair_type = 'Emergency Repair';
SELECT * FROM machinery_maintenance;
SELECT machinery_name, maintenance_date FROM machinery_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type='Scheduled';
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM technicians ORDER BY technician_experience DESC;
SELECT machinery_name, repair_description FROM machinery_maintenance JOIN repair_schedule ON machinery_maintenance.id = repair_schedule.machinery_id;
SELECT id, machinery_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM machinery_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM machinery_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, machinery_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT machinery_id, repair_date, repair_description FROM repair_schedule WHERE repair_description LIKE '%fault%' ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT technician_specialty, COUNT(*) FROM technicians GROUP BY technician_specialty HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT machinery_name, maintenance_date FROM machinery_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' AND machinery_name IN ('Machine A', 'Machine B');
SELECT technician_name, technician_experience FROM technicians WHERE technician_experience >= 5 ORDER BY technician_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs;
SELECT machinery_name, maintenance_schedule FROM machinery WHERE machinery_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, log_date, description FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT machinery_name, repair_cost FROM machinery JOIN repair_records ON machinery.machinery_id = repair_records.machinery_id;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, specialization FROM maintenance_staff WHERE specialization = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM machinery;
SELECT machinery_name, maintenance_schedule FROM machinery ORDER BY maintenance_schedule DESC;
SELECT machinery_name, last_repair_date, maintenance_schedule FROM machinery WHERE last_repair_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT m.machinery_name, r.repair_date, r.repair_cost FROM machinery m JOIN repair_records r ON m.machinery_id = r.machinery_id;
SELECT m.machinery_name, l.log_date, l.description, s.staff_name FROM machinery m JOIN maintenance_logs l ON m.machinery_id = l.machinery_id JOIN maintenance_staff s ON l.machinery_id = s.staff_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_name, manufacturer, location FROM machine_details ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT technician_name, specialization FROM technician_details WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE machine_id=100;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type='Preventive';
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(maintenance_date) AS maintenance_count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT machine_name, manufacturer, installation_date FROM machine_details ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
